body.name: Joy Seeker Ultra Slim Fixed TV Wall Mount, 0.63" Low Profile TV Mount Bracket for Most 42-100" LED/LCD/Plasma Flat Screen TVs, Fits up to VESA 800x600mm 220lbs, Easy Assembly Space Saving TV Hanger
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 44 mins
features: Universal TV Wall Mount: The TV mount fits most of the 42 43 50 55 65 70 75 80 85 100 inch flat screen TVs on the market. Max VESA size 800x600 mm and weight capacity 220 lbs. The Flat TV Mounting Bracket can be mounted on 8-30" wood studs or on a brick/concrete wall
Low Profile TV Mount: The ultra slim TV mount is ideal for spaces where space saving is required, only 0.63"/16mm from the wall, greatly improved space utilization
Heavy Duty TV Hanger: The TV mounting bracket is made of high-quality steel material to ensure the stability and durability of the TV
3-Step Easy Installation: Follow the instruction, attach the bracket to the TV, mount the wall plate to the wall, hang the TV on the wall plate, then you have finished installation
Satisfied Guarantee: We are confident about the quality of our products, if you have any questions or problems about the product, just contact us and we will solve the problem for you immediately

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Joy Seeker Fixed Low-Profile TV Mount This TV wall mount is fit for installation in a bedroom, living room, or home gym.Only 0.63" from the wall, which greatly improves space utilization.Fits most 42"-100" TVs, VASA mounting pattern of 600x800mm. This TV wall mount comes with a level corrector, so don't worry about the bracket tilting.
Previous page Next page 1 TV Specs 2 VESA 3 Wall Types 4 Cables Outlet

PRODUCT DETAILS Humanized Design With this drawstring, you can hang or remove TV easily. Please do not cut it off or damage it after installation. Stabilization Device The stable device of TV stand can keep your TV from falling down. Especially suitable for families with children. Open Wall Plate This slim TV wall mount is designed with open wall panels for outlets or obstructions. Saving Space Fixed TV wall mount is only 0.63 inches away from the wall, which greatly saves space for your family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice solid slim design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 85" Great Low Profile Option
reviews.reviewText: Used on 85" QN85B. Low profile looks great.TL;DR: You may have to purchase washers. Put power/cable port below mount. A little more work up front, but do it one time and it's worth the look.The company must have addressed previous complaints about bolt lengths. I received 9 different TV bolt mount options with length/width varieties. But, for the largest width bolts, the washers did not fit, and that's what I needed (widest & shortest). I was able to repurpose the washers received for the wall mount bolts, to use with the wide TV mount bolts. I have metal studs so I had to purchase toggle mounts anyway and didn't use the wood/drywall mounting bolts that came with the kit.Better to put outlet/cable port below the wall mount. But this kit still worked with power/cable port in the middle of the wall mount by running cables into the sides of the wall mount.The unlock cords were too short for 85". I added zip ties onto the bottom so I could still reach them. There is Velcro on the cords, and they can be shortened, but it would have been nice if there were Velcro hook patches on the beginning and end of the straps so it could also be lengthened.With the way I ran cables, it was a little hard to know if bottom locked in, until I got some experience with it. So don't pull to hard on the bottom of the TV if you have a big TV.Even with the bottom release straps, it would not be convenient to constantly add/remove cables. Also, my TV has input ports sideways with a recessed hole which helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Save space and give room a clean look
reviews.reviewText: Joy Seeker Low Profile TV Wall Mount at 0.63" is slimmer than most TV bracket. This’s a static TV Mount Bracket, which means it doesn’t tilt or has any swivel mechanism, but it does give your room an uncluttered look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Low Profile
reviews.reviewText: Don’t normally write reviews on items, but since this one didn’t have one at the time of buying I figured I’d leave one. I gave it a shot since it was the only one I found that was the closest to being as flush as the Frame TV mount was going to be.Overall, turned out perfect. No issues to report. Nothing is bending after checking it after a week. Seems solid! Going to be getting more for other rooms. Our 65in Frame TV has been hanging up for almost 2 months now and still no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Needed a bracket that spanned to 32 inches. This product did. Like the built in level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flush against the wall. Great for a bedroom
reviews.reviewText: We needed something that would keep the tv as flush as possible. This did the trick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was amazing to use at first. The screws came out and the TV fell from the wall! Fortunately, we saw it slipping and before it fell completely we removed it. Seems as if the screws were to small. Toggle bolts may be better to use with this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eaiset tv mount yet
reviews.reviewText: Great design the bracket can span long enough to clover 16in studs to 24 inch and still adjust the tv. Only down side is you have to route you lr wires to avoid the bracket other wise the tv gets heavy one handed as you try to move wires with the other
